title: Knight Foundation
description: The Knight Foundation is known for its vibrant and diverse color palette, featuring hues like black, cyan ('03CCE6'), green ('29C876'), pink ('FF4081'), yellow ('FDCE2E'), a very light gray ('F5F4F2'), medium gray ('CCCCCC'), dark gray ('666666'), and red ('FF3939'). These colors are sourced from the brand's official design and media kit available at knightfoundation.org and box.com.
